definitions.definition: The right by law to be the entity which determines who may publish, copy and distribute a piece of writing, music, picture or other work of authorship.
examples: Copyright is a separate legal area from trademarks.

definitions.definition: Such an exclusive right as it pertains to one or more specific works.
examples: The artist lost the copyrights to her songs when she signed the contract.
The images are still copyright of the original artist.

definitions.definition: A violation of copyright law; copyright infringement .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The right by law to be the entity which determines who may publish, copy and distribute a piece of writing, music, picture or other work of authorship.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Such an exclusive right as it pertains to one or more specific works.
( uncountable , informal , nonstandard ) A violation of copyright law; copyright infringement .
